categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Maximum was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer serving the Galactic Empire.
It was commanded by Darth Vader while he was searching for Rebel operatives and Habassan Envoy.

In the game Star Wars: X-Wing, the Maximum arrives on Tour of Duty 5 Mission 12 if Red Squadron's B-Wings have been disabled. It also turns up on Mission 20A of Tour of Duty 5 if Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Cathleen gets destroyed.
